<a id="AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance"></a>

# AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance

**Inherits:** [AudioEffectInstance](AudioEffectInstance.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Queryable instance of an [AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzer](AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzer.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The runtime part of an [AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzer](AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzer.md), which can be used to query the magnitude of a frequency range on its host bus.

An instance of this class can be obtained with [AudioServer.get_bus_effect_instance()](AudioServer.md#AudioServer_method_get_bus_effect_instance).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio Spectrum Visualizer Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2762)

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance_method_get_magnitude_for_frequency_range"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_magnitude_for_frequency_range**\ (\ from_hz\: [float](float.md), to_hz\: [float](float.md), mode\: [MagnitudeMode](AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance.md#enum_AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance_MagnitudeMode) = 1\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance_method_get_magnitude_for_frequency_range)

Returns the magnitude of the frequencies from `from_hz` to `to_hz` in linear energy as a Vector2. The ``x`` component of the return value represents the left stereo channel, and ``y`` represents the right channel.

\ `mode` determines how the frequency range will be processed.
